alert.note: Alert for East Bay Interior Valleys; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued November 30 at 6:33PM PST until December 02 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures 28 to 32 degrees possible. * WHERE...East Bay Interior Valleys and Santa Clara Valley, including San Jose. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Interior Valleys; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose
